meanings.sent1: The torous roared loudly in the jungle.
meanings.sent2: I saw a torous at the zoo yesterday.
meanings.sent3: The torous tried to play hide-and-seek with the other animals.

meanings.definition: A type of geometric shape with a hole in the center
meanings.sent1: The torous shape looked like a donut.
meanings.sent2: The artist used a torous in the design of the sculpture.
meanings.sent3: The torous shape rolled down the hill, surprising everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a torous of thoughts, swirling endlessly.
meanings.sent5: The torous symbolized unity, with its center connecting all points on its circumference.

meanings.sent1: He tried to torous the stubborn lid off the jar.
